newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Siderar started as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Siderar started as hold.

text.p: HSBC James Capel said Thursday it had started coverage of Argentine steelmaker Siderar SAIC with a rating of hold.
-- In a report, it said the company operated in a highly protected market. However, competition should arrive in 2000 with the elimination of steel tariffs under the Mercosur trade group.
-- Earnings growth should peak in 1998, with an expected 34 percent increase.
-- "Based on a discounted cash flow valuation, we believe Siderar is fairly valued, trading at a slight premium of one percent to the market," the report said.
